summary: Two new Dibellian books and one about Namira
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]For all those favoring Dibella.Adds three books,that can be bought at Anwen at Temple Of Dibella at Markarth.   1. Birth Of Dibella   2. Lady In Smoke   3. Apple Of Dibella.
- The Birth Of Dibella - needless to say speaks about birth of godess of Beauty.I was influenced by myths about Minerva and Aphrodite.
- Lady In Smoke - speaks about forbiden conjuration ritual called lady in smoke,which conjures an mirror reflection of godess of beauty.
- Apple Of Dibella - i was influenced by Apple Of Venus myth,thou I adapted the story to Tamrielic lore,so it speaks of alchemical wonder called Apple Of Beauty,which belongs to the faires of all-

Also adds a book Rain Upon House Of Amber,a book which speaks of Namira,for those who feel that Namira is kinda neglected.The book can be bought at Lisbet at Markarath.The book speaks of one of Namira protage who was werewolf.[/size][/font]
author: ibrica_orahovac
